Uses of Interface
org.vertx.java.core.Future

  • Packages that use Future 
    Package Description
    org.vertx.java.core  
    org.vertx.java.core.composition  
    org.vertx.java.core.file  

    • Uses of Future in org.vertx.java.core

      Subinterfaces of Future in org.vertx.java.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Deferred<T>
      Represents something that hasn't happened yet, but will occur when the Deferred.execute() method is called.
      Classes in org.vertx.java.core that implement Future 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlockingAction<T>
      Sometimes it is necessary to perform operations in vert.x which are inherently blocking, e.g.
      class  CompositeDeferred<T>
      A Deferred in the body of the run() of which you can get and pass back another future the result of which will be wired into this deferred.
      class  DeferredAction<T>
      DeferredAction is useful when you want to create your own Deferred actions.
      class  SimpleAction
      An Implementation of Deferred which can be used to implement custom synchronous actions.
      class  SimpleFuture<T> 
      class  SynchronousAction<T>
      A subclass of DeferredAction which can be used to implement custom synchronous actions.
      Methods in org.vertx.java.core that return Future 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<T> SimpleFuture.handler(CompletionHandler<T> completionHandler)
      Set a handler on the Future.
      Future<T> Future.handler(CompletionHandler<T> handler)
      Set a handler on the Future.

    • Uses of Future in org.vertx.java.core.composition

      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.composition that return Future 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Future<T> Composer.parallel(Deferred<T> deferred)
      Add a Deferred to be executed in parallel with any other Deferred instances added using this method since the last time (if any) the Composer.series(org.vertx.java.core.Deferred<T>) method was invoked.
      <T> Future<T> Composer.series(Deferred<T> deferred)
      Adds a Deferred that will be executed after any other Deferred instances that were added to this Composer have completed.
